Text:
Yes, yes, thank you Brother.
Very cool, get to d/l on a fat pipe while at work and watch when I get home..
Thanks footy, I already have P1.  Are you going to post non-HD version of P2?  My machine can't handle HD-quality video.
Sometimes i wish it was possible to remove commentary, Davidson is so damn boring.

I just registered to be able to thank you for these Footy - I've been getting them since Australlia! As with the first commenter, its difficult to get decent coverage where I am... I always look forward to your quick, high quality uploads.

Thanks again!
Boy, Johnny Herbert is the master at using a lot of words to say absolutely nothing.
